channel.title: Yell help

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && (command.length() > 5)) { if (!muted) { String text = command.substring(5); String[] bad = { "fuck", "bitch", "nigger" }; for (String element : bad) { if (text.indexOf(element) >= 0) { return; } } lastMessage[0] = lastMessage[1]; lastMessage[1] = lastMessage[2]; lastMessage[2] = Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1); if (lastMessage[0].equals(lastMessage[1]) && lastMessage[1].equals(lastMessage[2])) sendMessage(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else sendMessage(playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Add more swears

Read full topic

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(playerIsMember == 1) { try { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName + " : " + command.substring(5); command.replaceAll("no-ip", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("servegame", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www.", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll(".com", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("com", "[Censor]"); command.trim(); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("You typed it wrong."); } } else { sendMessage("Sorry, You must be a member to use yell!"); } }

Fixed it, including your indentations, and added a message when you type it wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell help
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

hey.
does anyone know how to make ::yell members only?
this is what i tried adn got all sorts of errors :S

if (command.startsWith("yell") && (playerIsMember == 1) && command.length() > 5) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName + " : " + command.substring(5); } try { command.replaceAll("no-ip", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("servegame", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("www.", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll(".com", "[Censor]"); command.replaceAll("com", "[Censor]"); command.trim(); } else { sendMessage("Sorry, You must be a member to use yell!"); } catch(Exception e) { } }
help please?

Read full topic
